snippet: Myanmar freed 452 prisoners Thursday in what appeared to be a good-will gesture ahead of a visit by President Obama, but human rights activists criticized the move.
abstract: Myanmar's government orders 452 prisoners freed in what appears to be good-will gesture ahead of visit by Pres Obama, but human rights activists criticize move for failing to include hundreds of political detainees.
lead_paragraph: Myanmar freed 452 prisoners Thursday in what appeared to be a good-will gesture ahead of a visit by President Obama, but human rights activists criticized the move.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
